name: The Aurelia Blog - Page 10
description: The official blog of the Aurelia project and Core Team.

posts.name: Aurelia at Build 2017
posts.description: If you are attending Build [http://build.microsoft.com] and are interested in seeing how to combine ASP.NET Core [https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/aspnet/core/] and Aurelia [http://aurelia.io], you'll want to attend "Getting Started with Aurelia and ASP.NET Core" this Friday.

posts.name: Aurelia Release Notes - Late April 2017
posts.description: Our most recent set of Aurelia releases includes the Aurelia Dialog Release Candidate. We have a post dedicated to the details of that release, which you can read here [http://blog.aurelia.io/2017/04/27/aurelia-dialog-release-candidate/]. You'll also see that Aurelia UX is moving ahead steadily, with new components and capabilities being added every one to two weeks.

posts.name: Aurelia Dialog Release Candidate
posts.description: Thanks to the hard work of Aurelia Core Team members, Strahil Kazlachev and Patrick Walters, we're proud to announce the Aurelia Dialog v1 Release Candidate.

posts.name: Introducing Aurelia Weekly
posts.description: Today we're excited to launch our official weekly Aurelia newsletter. Each week we'll be featuring Aurelia announcements, events, articles, community surveys and important web industry news. If you haven't already signed up, you can get on the list here [http://eepurl.com/ces50j]. We're thrilled to have Aurelia Core Team member Andreas WÃ¤nqvist [https://github.com/mobilemancer] putting together this great content on a regular basis and we look forward to hearing your feedback.

posts.name: Aurelia Release Notes - Early April 2017
posts.description: As always, we continue to make improvements to Aurelia's core as well as its most popular plugins. This set of releases includes not only bug fixes, but substantial improvements to the Aurelia Webpack Plugin, Aurelia UX, Aurelia CLI and our UI Virtualization Library.

posts.name: Case Study: netroStation
posts.description: One of the exciting things we get to do on the Aurelia blog is share various customer stories and case studies. Sometimes, it's for large, well-known companies like The Nordic Cinema Group [http://blog.aurelia.io/2017/01/18/case-study-nordic-cinema-group/] but at other times we get to tell the equally-exciting story of a developer who launched their first tech startup.

posts.name: Aurelia Release Update - Late March Edition
posts.description: As always, we're constantly working to improve Aurelia. Read on for the full list of minor and patch release update notes for our end-of-March releases.
